p: In order to determine the effect of the activation process on the quality of a manganese phosphate coating, five samples of the low-alloy steel were prepared. Each sample was phosphated according to Table 2, and the samples prepared in individual conditions were doubled. The XRD patterns for a reference and selected activated samples are shown in Figure 12. The coating after the activation process in an alkaline dilution and is characterized by good tightness. The size of the crystals varies between 2 and 10 μm. The coating obtained in the phosphating process without activation is formed with large crystals. Their size is within the range of 50–60 μm, see Figure 13.
